ISSUE.TITLE: Ability to grant admin privileges in UI
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Hi Brad, We just upgraded to the latest drone today. Looking great! I notice the Settings page is blank. I'm trying to figure out how to give other users Drone admin privs in the UI (so they can see settings and user administration). Is there a command-line method?

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Change AI Search to AIDA Search (#576)
